snippet: WME-IMG is taking aim at a burgeoning field for talent: the stylists who dress celebrities and who are becoming stars in their own right.
abstract: WME-IMG talent agency buys stylist agency Wall Group.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: WME-IMG is taking aim at a burgeoning field for talent: the stylists who dress celebrities and who are becoming stars in their own right.

headline.main: WME-IMG to Acquire Wall Group, an Agency for Stylists
headline.print_headline: WME-IMG Talent Agency Adds Celebrity Stylists to Its Offerings
